BuffBlueprint.Name: HEMA01ClarityBuff
BuffBlueprint.Description: Health Per Second and Mana Per Second Reduced.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01SwitchFire
AbilityBlueprint.Description:
The Torch Bearer relives his fiery death.

Mana Per Second briefly increased.

Fire abilities enabled.
Frost abilities disabled.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01SwitchIce
AbilityBlueprint.Description:
The Torch Bearer ends his suffering and returns to his normal form. For a brief time, his Weapon Damage is increased.

Ice abilities enabled.
Fire abilities disabled.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FireAura01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer channels the energy of the flame around him, increasing the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of his allies.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FireAura01
BuffBlueprint.Description: Attack Speed and Movement Speed increased.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FireAura02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer channels the energy of the flame around him, increasing the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of his allies.\n\nTorch Bearer's Weapon Damage is increased.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01RingOfFire01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer conjures a circle of fire around him, burning anything that stands in it for [GetDamageAmt] damage over [GetDuration] seconds.
AbilityBlueprint.GetDamageAmt: function(self) return math.floor( self.DamageAmt * self.Duration ) end

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01InspFlame
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer draws power from the flame, gaining [GetEnergy]% Mana and [GetEnergyRegen]% Mana Per Second.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FrostAura01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer exudes an aura of extreme cold, reducing the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of nearby enemies.

AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer exudes an aura of extreme cold, reducing the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of nearby enemies.\n\nThe chill energizes his allies, increasing their Mana Per Second.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FreezeStructure01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer blasts a target with intense cold. Interrupts abilities and increases target's cooldown time by [GetCooldownBuff]%. Lasts for [GetDuration] seconds.\n\nIf the target is affected by Frost Nova or Rain of Ice, Deep Freeze consumes each effect and deals [GetDamage] damage for each effect.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FreezeSlow01
BuffBlueprint.Description: Cooldowns increased. Attack and Movement Speed reduced.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FireandIce
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer weaves his elemental powers into a cataclysmic force. Fireball's damage is increased by [GetFireballDamage]. Deep Freeze deals [GetFreezeDamage] additional damage for each effect consumed.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FrostNova01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Releases a wave of frost, freezing all enemies around the Torch Bearer, stunning them for [GetStun] seconds. Demigods are stunned for [GetDemigodStun] seconds.\n\nAll units have [GetMovementSlow]% Movement Speed for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01FrostNova02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Releases a wave of frost, freezing all enemies around the Torch Bearer, stunning them for [GetStun] seconds. Demigods are stunned for [GetDemigodStun] seconds.\n\nAll units have [GetMovementSlow]% Movement Speed for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01RainIce01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: A maelstrom of hail and sleet pelts the target area dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage and slowing Attack Speed by [GetAttackSlow]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Description: A maelstrom of hail and sleet pelts the target area dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage and slowing Attack Speed by [GetAttackSlow]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEMA01Clarity
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Torch Bearer's chill cuts to the bone. Enemies affected by Rain of Ice have their Health Per Second and Mana Per Second reduced by [GetReduction]% for [GetDuration] seconds.\n\nThis effect can be consumed by Deep Freeze for additional damage.

Lasts for [GetDuration] seconds.\n\nIf the target is affected by Frost Nova or Rain of Ice, Deep Freeze consumes each effect and deals [GetDamage] damage for each effect.
